context:
Extract information from this obituary. Page URL: {{url}}. Page content: {{content}}.

Extract the following fields from the obituary text. Return ONLY the requested data with NO explanatory text. If a field is not found, return an empty string.

Person's full name (without titles like Mr., Mrs., Dr.)
Birth date in format DD MMM YYYY (e.g., 17 Dec 1923)
Birth place (city, state/country)
Death date in format DD MMM YYYY (e.g., 23 Mar 1987)
Death place (city, state/country)
Age at death (just the number, or empty if not stated)
Funeral or memorial service information (date, time, location)
List of surviving family members (spouse, children, grandchildren, etc.)
List of family members who died before this person (predeceased by)
Biographical information and life story (career, hobbies, accomplishments, personality)
